title: PharmCADD INdia Disease Control and Prevention

questions.content: Are you suffering from any of the following symptoms?
Do any of your family member or roommate have symptoms mentioned above
Have you visited any place, where patients with confirmed COVID-19 infection have reportedly been?
Have you visited any place, Any public facilities, crowded places or events?
Did you receive any communication/Guide from Government Health Officials? If yes, please provide details to hr@pharmcadd.com
